name: Monster Shooters
description:
My first complete game made with Unity for a small game jam in my community.  A game where you endlessly kill zombies, werewolves and cultists. Was a fun learning project and plan on making new games soon. 

Controls:

Shoot/Aim - Mouse

WASD - Movement

F - Melee

T - Switch Weapon (AK Unlocked at Wave 10)

All assets are from Opengameart

Special thanks to Opengameart, Unity, and Brackeys!
